description: From Middle English lightful, lihtful (“luminous, providing enlightenment”), from light, liht (noun) +‎ -ful (“full of (a feeling)”, suffix forming adjectives). See more at light (noun).

adjectives.description: lightful (comparative more lightful, superlative most lightful)

description: From light (“not weighed down”, adjective) +‎ -ful (“full of, having”, adjective).

adjectives.description: lightful (comparative more lightful, superlative most lightful)
